paper: SD-MAD_ Sign-Driven Few-shot Multi-Anomaly Detection in Medical Images

differences.summary: Improvements on multi-anomaly tasks are qualified (not universal)
differences.why_impacts_score: Reduced perceived robustness and generality of gains

evidence.baseline_quote: clear gains in multi-anomaly settings over CLIP/MedCLIP
evidence.final_quote: gains on multi-anomaly tasks over CLIP/MedCLIP in many cases

differences.summary: Sign-selection algorithm inconsistencies (undefined D_ng, sup/inf mix, empty-set behavior)
differences.why_impacts_score: Raises implementability and correctness concerns for a key component

evidence.baseline_quote: Unclear algorithmic realization of sign selection (D_inf, δ, h)
evidence.final_quote: D_ng is not defined elsewhere and aggregation sup vs inf is inconsistent

differences.summary: Mismatch between training (cosine distance) and inference (cosine similarity)
differences.why_impacts_score: Undermines consistency and reliability of learned decision rules

evidence.baseline_quote: High-level pipeline and equations are clear (Fig. 2; Eq. 1–8)
evidence.final_quote: Training uses cosine distance, whereas inference uses cosine_similarity; relationship not defined

differences.summary: Loss term weighting unspecified for L = L_img-text + L_anchor
differences.why_impacts_score: Ambiguous optimization could skew results and reproducibility

evidence.baseline_quote: The loss lacks temperature/margin hyperparameters; training stability choices are not discussed
evidence.final_quote: The overall loss L is unweighted; no normalization/weights are reported to balance terms

differences.summary: Table 1 average values flagged as inconsistent; claims not fully supported

evidence.baseline_quote: average pixel-level AUROC 92.5 vs. 92.2 MVFA, suggesting generality
evidence.final_quote: pixel-level 'Avg.' values in Table 1 appear inconsistent

differences.summary: Final explicitly adds Eq. 7–8 and Table 1 avg issues to justify score
differences.why_impacts_score: More concrete methodological and reporting flaws justify caution

evidence.baseline_quote: but lacks algorithmic/detail clarity and strong baselines (Experiments §4.3; Eq. 6)
evidence.final_quote: including Eq. 7–8 aggregation and Table 1 averages (Method §3.3; Table 1)
